Summary: Brilliant white ball. looked almost the size of venus. Bigger and brighter than any meteor
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Martinez
There were no other sightings in Martinez on or around October 31st 2013
divs: Sighting Details1) I was walking uphill on pine st. with my boy trick or treating. 2)It was so bright and sooo fast. 3) I thought it was a UFO.I was Navy air and am a sky watcher and have NEVER seen anything like this. 4)I noticed it at about 12:oo moving East to West. I don't know if flying is the right word but it Def. was not falling. Had to be going over 1,000 mph in a straight line. 5)I thought holy S#%T! That was a UFO! Kept watching the sky for several min. after that but saw nothing more. 6) Lost sight of the object as it passed behind Brionies hills.
